title: Define project scope and requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the quantum computing apps suite, including target users, use cases, and key features.

title: Design Quantum Computing Architecture for QuantumComputingApps - Revised
description:
Revise the design of the overall architecture for leveraging quantum computing capabilities in the apps suite. Focus on scalability, security, compatibility with existing tech stacks, and ensuring seamless integration of hardware and software components. Consider potential future improvements and technologies, including: 
1. Quantum error correction techniques.
2. Hybrid quantum-classical algorithms.
3. Implementing Post-Quantum Cryptography for data protection. This design should also account for the challenges in quantum devices' interoperability and the need for user-friendly interfaces.
4. Provide a modular structure that allows easy addition of new apps to the suite, and also emphasize on the importance of creating an extensible architecture that can accommodate the rapid advancements in quantum computing technology.
5. Consider implementing quantum simulation techniques for applications where quantum hardware is not yet available or cost-prohibitive.

title: Develop quantum computing algorithms
description: Implement quantum algorithms and protocols for various use cases, such as financial planning, creative design, and others.

title: Design User Interfaces - Quantum Computing Apps Suite (Revised)
description: Create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for the quantum computing apps suite, ensuring compatibility across various platforms, devices, and screen sizes. Prioritize accessibility, responsive design principles, consistency, and a seamless user experience. Integrate the latest UX/UI trends, quantum-specific design elements, and future-proofing techniques to accommodate advancements in quantum technology. Collaborate with frontend-developer team for implementation details and provide clear design specifications and guidelines. Ensure designs are modular and scalable to support future apps addition. Consider integrating AI-based interactive elements to improve user engagement. Update the design mockups periodically based on user feedback and technological advancements. Update the rfc_state field when ready for review by project manager.

title: Develop quantum computing simulators
description: Create simulators for testing and debugging quantum computing algorithms and applications before deploying to actual quantum hardware.

title: Implement Quantum Computing Security Measures (Revised)
description: Develop and implement robust security measures for the Quantum Computing Applications suite, addressing quantum computing-specific threats such as quantum cryptanalysis, side-channel attacks, and hardware Trojans. This will include integrating post-quantum cryptography, quantum key distribution methods (such as Quantum Key Distribution - QKD), and advanced threat detection systems. To ensure security across the entire application lifecycle, collaboration with other teams like DevOps, QA, Security Specialists, and Frontend/Backend Developers is encouraged. The focus should be on creating a secure quantum computing architecture. Upon completion of design, consultation with Database Specialist, DevOps Engineer, QA Tester, and Security Specialist will be necessary. This task depends on the 'Design quantum computing architecture' task.

title: Set up testing and quality assurance
description: Establish testing and quality assurance processes for the quantum computing apps suite, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Revised Plan for Deployment and DevOps for Quantum Computing Apps Suite
description: This revised RFC outlines a comprehensive deployment strategy and DevOps processes for the quantum computing apps suite. The plan includes: 1) Adoption of automation tools, CI/CD pipelines, and best practices to facilitate efficient and scalable deployments. 2) Utilization of platform-specific solutions, such as Qiskit Terra for quantum circuit simulation and IBM Quantum Composer for visual programming. 3) Addressing the challenges of integrating quantum computing with existing classical computational infrastructure. The plan will be flexible to accommodate future developments in the field of quantum computing.

title: Create documentation and user guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the quantum computing apps suite, covering installation, usage, and troubleshooting.
